runs.comm: back of a length, loose ball, steered uppishly but safely down to third man for the first runs of Pakistan's innings
full delivery, Nazir comes forward and drives that compactly to Karthik in the covers, nice-looking shot for no run
back of a length outside off stump now, Nazir gets tall and drives that to the left of point out to Pathan at third man, who fumbles the fielding job but doesnt allow the second
tight delivery on the stumps, no room to work with, and Hafeez defends off the front foot back to RP

got 'em! RP Singh! Follows up the fullish delivery with one back of a length, getting it to move away every so slightly and Hafeez, with minimal footwork, is tempted into a dab outside off stump only to see the outside-edge fly into Uthappa's safe hands at slip! India get the breakthrough early
back of a length down leg side, clips the pad and rolls down to Sreesanth, running around from fine leg, for a couple more to Pakistan's total
cracking shot! Sreesanth starts off with a short and wide freebie and Nazir thumps that hard and flat over cover for a one-bounce four

bang, thats six! Sreesanth serves up a short delivery now and can only stand and crain his neck to see the ball fly over deep midwicket! Nazir simply swiveled and pulled that off the meat of the bat for six!
and again! Sreesanth bowls it short and wide and Nazir flays the bat at it, connecting well enough to send the ball over third man's head, and thats six in two balls
back of a length, width again, but this time Nazir cant connect with his back-foot flash at it, and Dhoni collects the ball
oh shot, Nazir standing his ground and blasting a half-volley up and over point for another one-bounce boundary
full delivery again, just outside off stump, Nazir tries to pull off the front foot but gets an inside-edge to square leg
back of a length, hint of swing as the ball jags back into him, and he manages to chop it to point
well bowled, on a good length on off stump and its driven back down the ground, and RP gets a hand on it and fields himself, thats the kinda stuff India need

cleaned up! The experiment to send Akmal in at No. 3 flops, as he stands rooted in his crease and plays a poor shot across the line, just an ugly swipe, only to get bowled clean up as he misjudges the bounce! RP gets a second in successive overs and India are loving it!
good ball to get first up! A screaming, inswing yorker on middle and off has him nearly falling off balance! RP Singh is bowling fantastically here
back of a length outside off stump, decent pace, Younis steers it down to third man to open his account
thats poor, full and very wide down leg stump and Nazir helps it on its way with a flick to fine leg
better stuff this time, back of a length outside off stump, Younis stands and feels for it from the crease only to get beaten and keep the three slips interested
short and wide, should have been crunched away to the boundary but Younis' hard cut shot finds Yuvraj at point

good shout! Fuller ball, on about leg stump, Younis shuffles and tries to work it fine, gets rapped on the pads, they all go up but umpire Benson reckons its was going on over the top of the stumps, and thats what the replays show too
good length outside off, he comes forward and thinks about playing at it but decides to leave it alone for Dhoni
slower ball, something of a leg-cutter, pitches outside off stump and deviates from Younis as he fishes for it and gets beaten
good length on middle and leg, Younis shuffles and on-drives straight to the fielder, and thats a very impressive return over from Sreesanth - a maiden after a horror opening over
short and wide, angled away, Nazir gets tall and cuts it well to the left of Yuvraj at backward point for a single out to the deep
back of a length, well pushed wide of point for one as Irfan runs in from the boundary and fields it
good ball, moving in off a full length and Nazir falls over it as he on-drives to midwicket
short of a length, a bit of width and Nazir flashes at it and is lucky to get a thick outside-edge that screams over the vacant second slip region for four
now he oversteps, bowling short and wide again and this time Nazir cuts it backward of point for one
comes down the track, RP ends up serving up a full toss and Younis swivels, pulling it well over square leg for four, good way to cash in on the freebie
good length outside off stump, Younis comes forward and easily dabs it through gully as Irfan again does the fielding running in from the boundary
overpitched outside off stump, Nazir comes forward and presents a good-looking cover drive but straight to the fielder placed there
short of a length on off stump, he hops up and turns it well through square leg, finding the gap and watching the outfield take care of the rest, good use of the pace from Younis
full and wide, he frees the arms but doesnt connect, but its an extra run added to the scoreboard
slower ball, on a length, he sees it and gleefully pulls it over midwicket for four, great shot from Younis

oh superb throw! Slower ball again, fullish outside off stump, Younis eases into a nice offdrive and calls for the run towards mid-off, Nazir is late to react, Uthappa swoops in, picks and releases in one smooth action, fires in a direct it at the striker's end and Nazir and is caught just short of his crease!
back of a length outside off stump, left alone
back of a length, no movement, Malik tentatively gets across and then leaves it be once again
begins loosely, short and wide, he tries to cut too hard but cant beat the fielder at point
short and wide again, Younis cuts, getting an under-edge that rolls to Dhoni
slow half-volley outside off stump and this time Younis doesnt let it go, reaching out and driving it excellently through the covers for four
short of a lenth again, this time Younis calmly opens the face of the bat and eases it down to third man for a single
good length outside off stump, Malik gets forward and runs it straight to backward point
short of a length on the stumps, stays low as Malik pulls into the ground in front of midwicket
tossed up on off stump, flicked into midwicket for one
tossed up on a length, middle and off line, he on-drives for another single
pushed through quicker and flatter on middle and leg, and its flicked out to mid-on
flattish trajectory again from Pathan, and again its nudged into the onside for one
speared down leg stump, he flicks it easily down to RP Singh at deep backward square, singles being milked here with ease
tossed up a bit more, on a good length, Malik comes out but realizes he isnt to the pitch and ends up defending to cover
short and wide, cut behind backward point to bring him a single
full and wide now, he's really letting them take the singles is Joginder, as the batsman easily drives through the covers for one

but he's got his man this time! Joginder bowls it fuller for once and immediately gets Younis, who cant resist thumping it down the ground, not timing it off the middle at all, and mid-on easily pouches it in his lap without movin more than a foot!
back of a length outside off stump, left alone by Misbah
back of a length outside off stump, pushed off the back foot into the covers where Rohit Sharma moves well and fields
tight stuff, just back of a length and he steers it towards backward point, where Yuvraj reacts ever so quickly and denies the single
starts off with a rank short delivery, which Malik pulls very poorly over midwicket, the balls up in the air for a while but lands to the left of the fielder in the deep
back of a length, he opens the face of the bat and runs it to backward point for one
just a touch fuller, but still wide enough for Malik to open the face and run it wide of the fielder for another single
good bowling this, Irfan pitching it on a good length and forcing Misbah to play across the line, only to mistime it and play it back to the bowler
width again from Pathan, and its chopped uppishly and just wide of the diving wide slip
fullish ball, he comes out and drives on the up, completely mistiming it but lucklily for him mid-off is deep and the ball drops safely
fullish and outside the off, driven at, outside edge down to the keeper
short of a good length and wide outside the off, a bit too much width, cut just wide of point
fullish and on the off, the batsman walks across his stumps and clips the ball into the on side for a couple more

full and wide outside the off, swing away from the bat, big swing, there's a thick sound and Dhoni goes up for the catch, loud appeal from the bowler too ... Simon Taufel gives it a wide and the Indians are unhappy
good-length ball outside the off, this time it's safely left alone to the keeper
again full and on the off, Misbah walks right across his stumps and deflects the ball into the leg side for a single
just short of a driving length and on the off, Shoaib opens the face of the bat and runs the ball down towards third-man for a single
fullish and on the off, a hint of swing into the right-handed batsman, worked to the leg side
short of a good length and on the leg stump, the ball grips a touch and the batsman closes the face of the bat early, the ball bobs off the leading edge back down the pitch

short of a good length and outside the off, again this ball does not come onto the bat too well, Shoaib Malik goes for the pull but he's not in control of the shot. The ball goes straight to midwicket and Irfan Pathan has a big, big wicket as this match tilts just a touch in India's favour
short and very high, easily left alone to the keeper and wide called

fullish and outside the off stump, Afridi goes for the big hit. He wants to hit this one out of the ground. The contact is no good, though and Afridi has got right under the ball. This one goes high in the air but has no distance on it. It will only get as far as mid-off and Sreesanth takes the catch. That could well be the end of it as far as Pakistan are concerned ... This is a huge moment in this final.
worked away into the on side
short of a good length and outside the off, played away into the off side for a single as Yuvraj fields and throws the stumps down
low full-toss on the leg stump, flicked away into the vacant spaces in the leg side
another flat, full delivery that can only be easd down to long-on
short of a good length and outside the off, chopped down to short third-man
another low full-toss, tough to get this away, eased down to long-on for another single
yorker fired in quick on the stumps, the batsman just about gets bat down in time and digs the ball out. It runs away down to the fine-leg boundary
fullish and on the off, end of a tight over from Harbhajan Singh
fullish and outside the off, slower ball, a bit of swing in, driven inside out through cover
short of a driving length and on the off, all the batsman can do is chop the ball down to point
fuller and on the off, again a hint of swing in to the right-handed batsman, played down to cover with soft hands for a single
just short of a good length and outside the off, a bit of extra pace on this, good variation of pace here, chopped at and missed
back of a length and just a touch too straight, worked to the on side but again it's just the single and the required rate climbs
slower ball, the off cutter, on the stumps, clipped off the hips to the leg side for another single
reverse sweep, the ball goes past the infield, it won't go all the way, just a couple
another low full-toss, hacked away across-the-line down to long-on, Pakistan still can't find the boundary
very full and quite fast, flat too, driven through cover
again the yorker, worked through the on side
full-toss on the stumps, just swatted to the leg side
low full-toss outside the off, swung away to leg, Uthappa goes for the catch, diving well and getting both hands to the ball. But as he tumbles and falls the ball pops out of his hand
just short of a driving length and on the off, can't do too much with that, played back down the pitch to the bowler
short of a good length and outside the off, this one holds its line and goes away with the angle, cut shot played and missed. Valuable dot balls this.
slower ball, just outside the off, the batsman runs this wide of point to pick up a single that brings up Pakistan's 100

fullish and on the off, that's a rare length ball from Pathan. Yasir Arafat picks that one up early and hits it straight back over the bowler's head for a boundary. Haven't seen too many boundaries in the last few overs
short of a length and outside the off, cut played and missed

on the stumps and fullish, Arafat tries to hammer this one over the leg side, he misses and Pathan hits. The stumps are shattered and the Indians converge on Pathan who has just completed and excellent, and probably matchwinning spell. Excellent varations and control and Pakistan are in deep trouble.
full and far down the leg side, that's easily called a wide
Misbah moves to leg, Harbhajan sees him and fires the ball outside the off, clever bowling
good response from Misbah who clears his foot and heaves the ball over midwicket. That is a good, clean hit for a much-needed six
full and straight, defended to the on side
fullish and on the pads, clipped to the on side but Misbah declines the single, he wants to do this himself
short of a length and on the stumps, Misbah lines it up and clatters it into the stands over midwicket. That is a spectacular shot, well planned and executed even better
And Another! Misbah goes right back in the crease anticipating the full ball and times this sweetly into the stands over midwicket. That is a clinical hit from a very level-headed batsman
fullish and on the off, Sohail Tanveer comes to the party here. He picks this one up and flicks it for six over long-on. That is a sweet shot!
full and down the leg side, Sreesanth comes around the stumps, this is a terrrible bit of bowling and is easily called wide
short of a good length and on the stumps, play and a miss, struck on the body, the batsman pinch the leg-bye and Misbah gets on strike
quick ball just outside the off, this one skids through, cut played and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and angled into the pads, worked away for a single through square-leg

full and on the stumps, this is another bit of slightly brainless bowling from Sreesanth, the angle brings the ball in to the pads and Sohail Tanveer flicks superbly over square-leg for six. Cracking shot that!

Comeback! Sreesanth finally gets it right! A quick yorker on the off stump. Tanveer loses his off stump but he's got 12 from only 4 balls and done a fair bit. Can't expect much more than that from him.
short of a good length and outside the off, chopped down to third-man and a single taken
short of a good length and on the stumps, the height carries the ball over the stumps, Dhoni fumbles it and the batsmen run for their lives to steal a bye.
short of a length, outside the off, Misbah goes across his stumps and tries to heave the ball over the leg side, he misses and is struck on the pad. Loud shout for the lbw, turned down
short of a length and down the leg side, pull played and not a clean connection. The ball balloons down to the leg side and it's just a single
Leg-stump yorker from RP Singh! That's just too good from RP Singh. Umar Gul plays all over this one and loses his leg stump. Fabulous bowling from RP Singh as this match heads to an exciting finish
yorkr full and outside the off, Asif watches this one carefully and slices it away to the third-man boundary.That's a priceless boundary to end the penultimate over.
short of a length and far outside the off stump, that one barely lands on the pitch. Nerves here for Joginder Sharma. Big, big wide. Easily called
short of a good length and outside the off, play and a miss, the tension mounts

full-toss outside the off, that's not the place to bowl at this time. Misbah is cool as ice, lines this up and pounds the ball straight back down the ground. This is a baseball style home run. Such incredible hitting under pressure. You have to give it to Misbah

India! It's all over here! Full and on the stumps. Misbah goes for the scoop shot over short fine-leg. That is a risky shot to play with only 6 needed from 4 balls. Straight up in the air and Sreesanth takes the catch. India have won by 5 runs in the inaugural ICC World Twenty20
